page.description: Delete a main Alpha Five program.
page.original:
&ltOBJECT>.DELETE() Syntax : Object_Type.DELETE( Layout_Name as C ) ArgumentDescription Object_TypeThis word can be any of the following:
"Browse"
"Form"
"Label"
"Letter"
"Report" Layout_NameThe name of a form, browse, label, letter, or report layout.
Description The &ltOBJECT>.DELETE() method applies to objects of type:
Browse
Form
Label
Letter
Report The &ltOBJECT>.DELETE() method deletes the named object from disk. Limitations Desktop applications only. Examples This script deletes the Invoice report. :Report.delete("Invoice")
See Also Form Functions and Methods, Browse Functions and Methods
